product_name: Brooks Equilibrium Sleeveless Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Keep your temperature in balance during your tough workouts with the Brooks Equilibrium sleeveless shirt. Lightweight polyester/spandex fabric wicks moistures and dries quickly to help you beat the heat. Mesh panels at underarms and shoulders disippate heat and moisture. Flatlock seams prevent chafing. Reflective accents on the Brooks Equilibrium sleeveless shirt help keep you visible in dim light. Closeout.
short_description: Keep your temperature in balance during your tough workouts with the Brooks Equilibrium sleeveless shirt.
